page.title: Palestinian food delivery app reminds you of the original taste | aklah app

hero.title: Palestinian Food Reminds You of the Old Gold Days

application.title:
Our Palestinian Chefs weave magic over their delicious meals.
 Every bite says it all!
application.subtitle:
Try now the Palestinian Cuisine with family and friends!
 Choose meals and desserts you love. Cheer them up, and have your time and effort saved by Aklah.

subtitle.text1:
Dreaming about starting your business?
 Eager for letting people be fat of happiness and your credit card fat of cash?
 All you need is to join our family.
 The world for Palestinian Cuisine
subtitle.text3: With Aklah, you are the Chef!

desktop.title: Instantly deliverable to your house! Aklah deliveres.
desktop.subtitle:
Welcome to our Aklah!
 Kindly browse through our app. To sweeten your gatherings, customize your order.
  With a click, your order is deliverable hot to wherever you are.

list.two: Track your order through the map
list.four: Buy online; pick up from the chef!

desktop.hint: With Aklah, the more, the merrier!

testimonials.paragraph: "You are one of the best websites and applications through which you can order Palestinian food online. Through my experience with it, I advise you to download the app, and enjoy the taste!"
